Question 40.Question: Please describe any differences in how it impacted your learning (comparing GenAI and your teacher)?
Question 40.Response: Sometimes we need to make our thoughts clear on something or to show/send/get some formal/informal informations related to our work and learning, so GenAI sometimes can help us make our thoughts and writing clear.

Question 41.Question: Were there any differences in how the feedback made you feel (comparing GenAI and your teacher)?
Question 41.Response: I think a teacher will always be honest with you whether to give a appreciation or to positively criticise you about what you are doing but I feel GenAI will always try to make you feel better about your input and that can be a bit problematic if you are too dependent on this. One has to always keep his/her mind clear on their own and should not rely all over on GenAI

Question 42.Question: Describe any other differences between the feedback you received from GenAI and your teacher.
Question 42.Response: If I may recall a incident about an assessment that I was given , so I checked it up with my GenAI and I received a feedback and examples that I didn’t find relevant but my teacher made my thoughts clear on that. But on the other side, once I was not satisfied with my teacher on how he wants us to express ourselves in our assessment but GenAI helped me more on that case . So I think there’s always two sides of a coin so we have to make a clear side on our own that what is better for us and should act accordingly.
